languages.text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants great powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} is increased by +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies (including the signet's wearer).</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies (including the signet's wearer) gain +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Перстень Инквизиции дает значительные возможности:
-<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Со всех союзников (включая обладателя перстня) снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Все союзники (включая обладателя перстня) получают +<u>(Убеждение персонажа / 7)</u> временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и +<u>(Убеждение персонажа / 10)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца боя.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants great powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} is increased by +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies (including the signet's wearer).</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies (including the signet's wearer) gain +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

The Signet of the Inquisition grants great powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} is increased by +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies (including the signet's wearer).</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies (including the signet's wearer) gain +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

languages.text:
审判庭的图章拥有强大的力量：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}提高30点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移除所有盟友（包括图章的装备者本人）的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>所有盟友（包括图章的装备者本人）获得<u>（装备者的劝说/7）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}临时生命值{/g}与<u>（装备者的劝说/10）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants great powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} is increased by +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies (including the signet's wearer).</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies (including the signet's wearer) gain +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
审判庭的图章拥有强大的力量：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}提高30点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移除所有盟友（包括图章的装备者本人）的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>所有盟友（包括图章的装备者本人）获得<u>（装备者的劝说/7）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}临时生命值{/g}与<u>（装备者的劝说/10）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>

审判庭的印记会赐予以下效果：
- <indent=5%>+30{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移除所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>所有盟友获得<u>（装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}/7）</u>点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}与<u>（装备者的劝说/7）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>

审判庭的印记会赐予以下效果：
- <indent=5%>+30{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移除所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>所有盟友获得<u>（装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}/7）</u>点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}与<u>（装备者的劝说/7）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>

languages.text:
異端審問庁の印章は強大な力を与える：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+30追加される。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、そして{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}の効果は全ての味方(印章の着用者も含む) から取り除かれる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>全ての味方(印章の着用者も含む)は+<u>(着用者の説得/ 7)</u>の一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}、そして+<u>(着用者の説得 / 10)</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を戦闘終了まで得る。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants great powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} is increased by +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies (including the signet's wearer).</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies (including the signet's wearer) gain +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

異端審問庁の印章指輪が次の大きな力を与える：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}+30</indent>
-<indent=5%>味方全員の{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}の効果を解除</indent>
-<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで味方全員は+<u>（使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}/7）</u>の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}、+<u>（使用者の説得/7）</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を獲得する。</indent>

異端審問庁の印章指輪が次の大きな力を与える：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}+30</indent>
-<indent=5%>味方全員の{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}の効果を解除</indent>
-<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで味方全員は+<u>（使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}/7）</u>の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}、+<u>（使用者の説得/7）</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を獲得する。</indent>

languages.text:
Das Siegel der Inquisition gewährt vorteilhafte Kräfte:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} wird um +30 erhöht.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} werden von allen Verbündeten entfernt.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Alle Verbündeten erhalten +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g} des Trägers / 7)</u> temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und +<u>(Überredung des Trägers / 7)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants great powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies gain +<u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 7)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

Das Siegel der Inquisition gewährt vorteilhafte Kräfte:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} wird um +30 erhöht.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} werden von allen Verbündeten entfernt.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Alle Verbündeten erhalten +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g} des Trägers / 7)</u> temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und +<u>(Überredung des Trägers / 7)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes.</indent>

languages.text:
La chevalière de l'Inquisition confère de grands pouvoirs :
-<indent=5%>+30 à la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} affectant les alliés (porteur de la chevalière compris) sont dissipés.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Tous les alliés (porteur de la chevalière compris) gagnent +<u>(Persuasion du porteur/7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires et +<u>(Persuasion du porteur/10)</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants great powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} is increased by +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies (including the signet's wearer).</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies (including the signet's wearer) gain +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

traits.locale_text:

-<indent=5%>+30 à la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g}.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} sont supprimés sur tous les alliés.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Tous les alliés bénéficient de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} de l'utilisateur / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires et +<u>(Persuasion de l'utilisateur / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}d'armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>

La chevalière de l'Inquisition confère de grands pouvoirs :
-<indent=5%>+30 à la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} affectant les alliés (porteur de la chevalière compris) sont dissipés.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Tous les alliés (porteur de la chevalière compris) gagnent +<u>(Persuasion du porteur/7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires et +<u>(Persuasion du porteur/10)</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>

languages.text:
El sello de la Inquisición proporciona efectos beneficiosos:
-<indent=5%>El {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Ímpetu{/g} aumenta +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Elimina los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} de todos los aliados (incluido el portador del sello).</indent>
-<indent=5%>Todos los aliados (incluido el portador del sello) ganan +<u>(Persuasión del portador / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales, +<u>(Persuasión del portador / 10)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} hasta el final del combate.</indent>

-<indent=5%>+30 моментума</indent>
-<indent=5%>Со всех союзников снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>Все союзники получают +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g} персонажа / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}временного здоровья{/g} и +<u>(Убеждение персонажа / 7)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца боя</indent>

Перстень Инквизиции дает значительные возможности:
-<indent=5%>+30 моментума</indent>
-<indent=5%>Со всех союзников снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>Все союзники получают +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g} персонажа / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}временного здоровья{/g} и +<u>(Убеждение персонажа / 7)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца боя</indent>

languages.text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants great powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies gain +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies gain +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>
